title: The Fruit of the Fallen
description: When an infant is thrust into the arms of Dr. Jonathan Keats by a dying nun, he finds himself accused of murder. His search to identify the child carries him to Europe and to a secret religious society hiding a prophecy of unimaginable proportions. Will Serenity D'Evele fulfill a frightening prophecy? In THE FRUIT OF THE FALLEN, her every action and decision could decide the fate of the world...
author: J.C. Burnham
